thread.title: Weather closes two roads in Rocky Mountain National Park
thread.title_full: Weather closes two roads in Rocky Mountain National Park - The Denver Post

author: Elizabeth Hernandez
title: Weather closes two roads in Rocky Mountain National Park
text:
Old Fall River Road in Rocky Mountain National Park has closed for the season, officials said Friday.
The road will remain open to bikes and leashed pets until Nov. 30, according to a Rocky Mountain National Park news release.
The road will reopen April 1.
Trail Ridge Road in the national park continues to be closed due to snow and freezing temperatures, the release said.
It is not known when the road will reopen.
For recorded Trail Ridge Road updates, people can call 970-586-1222.
Elizabeth Hernandez: 303-954-1223, ehernandez@denverpost.com or twitter.com/ehernandez
